üî¢ The Rule of Five

In all of human history, there have never been more than five non-magical humans who know about the existence of magic and supernatural species at any given time. This is not a coincidence‚Äîit is a carefully maintained cosmic balance.

üìä The Complete History

  • Total Ever: Exactly 5 individuals in all of human history
  • Current Status: All five are deceased (last died 1934)
  • Knowledge Status: Their secrets died with them
  • Modern Era: Zero non-magical humans currently know the truth
  • Protection Level: Absolute‚Äîreality prevents any sixth discovery

‚öñÔ∏è The Cosmic Balance

The Rule of Five is not merely tradition‚Äîit appears to be woven into the fabric of reality itself. When a sixth person discovers the truth, either they forget through natural circumstances, one of the existing Five dies, or the new person themselves meets an unfortunate end.

üåå Why Five?

ÔøΩ Magical Theories
  • Five represents balance in many magical systems
  • Human consciousness can only handle limited "impossible" truths
  • Five scattered individuals cannot organize effectively
  • Prevents formation of dangerous truth-seeking groups
  • Maintains the separation between magical and mundane worlds
‚öñÔ∏è Cosmic Theories
  • The number five appears in fundamental laws of reality
  • Ancient protective spells bound to this limitation
  • Primordial entities designed this constraint
  • Natural barrier between dimensional planes
  • Failsafe against mortal discovery of magic

üîê The Code of Silence

All People Who Know operate under an informal but strictly observed code of silence. This isn't enforced through magic or threats, but through understanding of the catastrophic consequences that would follow widespread supernatural exposure.

üìú Core Principles

  1. Discretion First: Never reveal supernatural knowledge to unprepared individuals
  2. Protect the Innocent: Shield ordinary humans from supernatural dangers
  3. Support the Balance: Aid magical beings in maintaining secrecy
  4. Share Responsibly: Exchange information only with verified network members
  5. Emergency Override: Break silence only when human lives are at immediate risk
